text: New York Liberty Star Sabrina Ionescu Marries Las Vegas Raiders Center Hroniss Grasu Sabrina Ionescu married fellow Oregon Ducks alum and NFL player Hronnis Grasu in a star-studded Laguna Beach wedding More stories from [Sabrina Ionescu](/topic/sabrinaionescu) More stories from [Sports](/topic/sports) ['He's just a machine': Manchester United striker target is on fire right now, Ten Hag wants him this summer](/topic/sports/he-s-just-a-machine-manchester-united-striker-target-is-on-fire-right-now-ten/a-WfFxXDj_SgSxE8P_Ee9E7w%3Aa%3A35905074-9905f99ab7%2Funitedinfocus.com) Manchester United target Brian Brobbey is being hailed as a ‘machine’ after becoming a goalscoring sensation for Ajax.It’s still difficult to fully … [Champions League quarter-final draw: Best and worst outcomes for Arsenal and Man City](/topic/sports/champions-league-quarter-final-draw-best-and-worst-outcomes-for-arsenal-and-man/a-1o8JoTz0RWuYoGX7bln3gA%3Aa%3A1643597903-63bcbd3aad%2Fco.uk) Manchester City and Arsenal will be part of a heavyweight Champions League draw as Europe's top competition reaches the business end. Each of the … [3 Noteworthy Observations From UNC's Blowout Win Over Florida State](/topic/sports/3-noteworthy-observations-from-unc-s-blowout-win-over-florida-state/a-siZZ42IfRO-l84_ZkPjMSw%3Aa%3A61877088-0371cc18a4%2Foldnorthbanter.com) The Tar Heels put forth one of the most impressive performances by any team all year The No. 1 seed in the ACC Tournament is moving on to the … Join the flipboard community Discover, collect, and share stories for all your interests [Sign up](/signup) More stories from [New York Liberty](/topic/newyorkliberty) [Liberty star Sabrina Ionescu, Raiders center Hroniss Grasu get married with beach backdrop](/topic/newyorkliberty/liberty-star-sabrina-ionescu-raiders-center-hroniss-grasu-get-married-with-beac/a-2ikpjV2mSSqipQx__Ylg2w%3Aa%3A42987291-ca0e7aa07a%2Fusatoday.com) Sabrina Ionescu tied the knot! The New York Liberty star got married to Las Vegas Raiders center Hroniss Grasu on Sunday in Laguna Beach, California. On Tuesday, Ionescu posted a picture of Grasu overlooking the sunset and the ocean to her Instagram stories with the caption, "My husband" and a white … [WNBA Star Sabrina Ionescu Marries Las Vegas Raiders Lineman Hroniss Grasu](/topic/newyorkliberty/wnba-star-sabrina-ionescu-marries-las-vegas-raiders-lineman-hroniss-grasu/a-BQL52qktThWsn8Ox-W_Mng%3Aa%3A18546084-cf7e8f2fe3%2Ftmz.com) Sabrina Ionescu is officially off the market ... the star NY Liberty guard just married her longtime boyfriend over the weekend, Raiders center …
